name: Marvel Thanos Simulator Fan Game
description:
This is a Thanos Sandbox Simulator game were you possess the power of the infinity gaunlet. You are able to Use the Time Stone, Power Stone and Space Stone

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fFm6dR9D0wc

This game was our first unity project to help us learn the language and software. The game was made be me and my friend (Atroxit) and all the respective licenes belong to the respective owners such as marvel studios and epic games.
